[Music]
Number three, Claraara.
She's a senior developer living in LA and, um, in her mid-40s aiming for, um, roles in the 200,000 plus salary range.
So this, uh, person, she has been in, uh, working already for, um, two decades or more, uh, in this space and has tons of experience.
In fact, um, has done all sorts of roles in, uh, software engineering, uh, developing apps, developing, um, programs, developing, um, different things for different companies.
Most recently, for the past, I think it was five year, oh, sorry, three or five years, I don't remember, let's say three years, uh, she has been creating software using Python.
Interestingly, software that processes data, lots of excel, lots of CSV files using Python in the medical space.

Anyway, so she's been creating all this, uh, software using Python, specifically pandas and, uh, other tools to process, uh, lots of data.
